atk-s0402a13:1_1: Catutthassa paṭhame catūhi paccayehi attano ca parassa ca antarapaṭicchādanavasena santharaṇaṁ āmisasanthāro, dhammena santharaṇaṁ dhammasanthāro.
atk-s0402a13:2_1: Tatiye vuttappakārassa āmisassa esanā āmisesanā, dhammassa esanā dhammesanā.
atk-s0402a13:3_1: Pañcame matthakappattā āmisapariyesanā āmisapariyeṭṭhi, matthakappattāva dhammapariyesanā dhammapariyeṭṭhīti vuttā.
atk-s0402a13:4_0: 157. Chaṭṭhe āmisena pūjanaṁ āmisapūjā, dhammena pūjanaṁ dhammapūjā.
atk-s0402a13:6_1: Aṭṭhame āmisaṁ ijjhanakasamijjhanakavasena āmisiddhi, dhammopi ijjhanakasamijjhanakavasena dhammiddhi.
atk-s0402a13:7_0: 160. Navame āmisena vaḍḍhanaṁ āmisavuddhi, dhammena vaḍḍhanaṁ dhammavuddhi.
atk-s0402a13:8_0: 161. Dasame ratikaraṇaṭṭhena āmisaṁ āmisaratanaṁ, dhammo dhammaratanaṁ.
atk-s0402a13:10_1: Ekādasame āmisassa cinanaṁ vaḍḍhanaṁ āmisasannicayo, dhammassa cinanaṁ vaḍḍhanaṁ dhammasannicayo.
atk-s0402a13:11_0: 163. Dvādasame āmisassa vipulabhāvo āmisavepullaṁ, dhammassa vipulabhāvo dhammavepullanti.
